tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE teacher_schedule (
  teacher_id INT,
  course_id INT,
  day_of_week VARCHAR,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  teacher_id UUID REFERENCES teachers(teacher_id),
  day_of_week VARCHAR(10),
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
);
